NAEB RADIO NETWORK
PROGRAM OFFERING
PROGRAM OFFERING
Title: MJSIC NOW — AND THEN
Type: Music and Commentary
Time: 60 sOO
No«: 12 programs
Origin: WFMT-Sablosky-Fromm Foundation
Audience: General
Serial Number: 57-11
Release Date: January 6, 1957
In this series we have a survey of music, linking the past and present in terms
of certain timeless elements in musical forms, to show the common purposes of
composers and listeners of today and the past. Your commentator is Irving Sablosky,
music critic for the Chicago Daily Nows*
This series was originally presented over Radio Station WFMT (FM), Chicago, in
cooperation with Mr. Sablosky and the Fromm Foundation, without whose kind
permission we would not bo able to distribute it to our member stations.
